text.section: Except as provided in § 11-310 of this title, a majority of the members then serving on the Commission is a quorum.
The Commission shall meet in the State, at the times and places that the Commission determines.

Each member of the Commission is entitled to:
compensation in accordance with the State budget; and
reimbursement under the Standard State Travel Regulations for expenses for each Commission meeting attended, as provided in the State budget.
While in office, each member of the Commission shall be covered by a surety bond in the form and amount required by law.
